title: User Auth Service
description: Lightweight authentication and session management microservice.
long_description: A Flask-based microservice providing JWT authentication, refresh tokens, and role-based access controls. Includes Docker Compose manifests and SQL migrations.

title: Task API
description: REST API for task management with background workers.
long_description: Built with FastAPI and SQLAlchemy, supports background jobs via Celery and Redis. Includes OpenAPI docs and CI pipelines.

title: Portfolio Backend
description: The backend serving this portfolio and content translations.
long_description: Small Flask app with blueprint structure, service/repository separation, and JSON-backed content storage for quick edits.

title: Portfolio Frontend
description: Frontend for the portfolio with responsive modal and card UI.
long_description: A clean, minimal, and accessible frontend for the portfolio, featuring a modal work showcase and semantic card components.
